name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Crunchyroll Full Screen, All The Time

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keeps fullscreen, even after autoplay. Click on a show, click on the toggle button, and press F11, and enjoy your binge.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ever get annoyed that Crunchyroll exits full screen when autoplaying the next episode? This will stop that. Just get to a show, click on the extension "toggle binge mode" button, and you can binge in peace, without having to click the fullscreen button every time.
